name: HubSpot Form Chooser
description: Select HubSpot forms by name instead of manually copying form IDs. Features search, caching, and optional archive filtering.
author: SafetyChain

global.label: HubSpot Private App Token
global.hint: Enter your HubSpot private app access token with 'forms' read scope

global.label: Filter out archived forms
global.hint: Hide forms with [archived] or [archive] in their name

global.label: Show creation dates
global.hint: Display form creation dates in the dropdown

global.label: Cache Duration (hours)
global.hint: How long to cache form data before refreshing from HubSpot
